org.richfaces.application

Class DefaultModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.richfaces.application.DefaultModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Module

    public class DefaultModule
extends Object
implements Module

    Default RichFaces configuration module.

    User can implement application-specific Module in order to rewrite this configuration.
